Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LsCole (L. serricorne coleoptericin, antimicrobial protein; natural AMPs,  insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; UCLL1)

Literature.Author: Zhang Y, Yan Y, Smagghe G, Yang H, Dai RH, Yang WJ.2023
Literature.Title: Identification and immune analysis of antimicrobial peptides from the cigarette beetle (Lasioderma serricorne).

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (32.52%) toAstucin. A: 13%. GRAVY: -0.80; M Wt: 12990.237; M formula:  C560H876N175O174S1, mol ex coeff: 19630. It contains seven cysteines. May form dimers.Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC25923 (MIC 80 ug/ml), E.coli ATCC25922 (MIC 160 ug/ml), and  C.albicans CMCC(F)98001 (MIC > 160 ug/ml).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: fusion proteins inclusion bodies.GeneBank: gene sequences can be downloadedMW751545.
